fabriccloud.provider package¶

Submodules¶

fabriccloud.provider.aws module¶

fabriccloud.provider.aws.mountStatus()[source]¶

unused

fabriccloud.provider.aws.printhttp()[source]¶

prints an easy-to-use http string to console (and mac’s clipboard)

fabriccloud.provider.aws.printssh()[source]¶

prints an easy-to-use ssh string to console (and mac’s clipboard)

fabriccloud.provider.aws.setDefaults()[source]¶

Configures the fabric environment to support an aws environment.

fabriccloud.provider.aws.sync()[source]¶

unimplemented

unimplemented
